definition: screensaver/abbr. for 屏幕保護程序|屏幕保护程序[ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4]
to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Install the Blue Screen of Death screen-saver on someone’s computer.
sentences.chinese: 把别人的电脑屏保换成蓝屏死机图。

sentences.english: Share your templates, icons, fonts, wallpapers, screensavers, etc!
sentences.chinese: 在这里共享你的模板，图标，字体，壁纸，屏保等。

sentences.english: get a screensaver of your favorite yoga poses, etc.
sentences.chinese: 把你最喜欢的瑜伽姿势设置为你的屏保，等等。

sentences.english: Fliqlo is a free screensaver that has been around for ages.
sentences.chinese: fliqlo也是这里领域内你是悠久的免费屏保。

sentences.english: Install the Blue Screen of Death screen-saver on someone's computer.
sentences.chinese: 把别人的电脑屏保换成蓝屏死机图。

sentences.english: Auto Keylock and play screen saver.
sentences.chinese: 自动键盘锁和播放屏保。

sentences.english: They know that people want to have screensavers of popular individuals.
sentences.chinese: 他们知道人们想拥有某个明星的屏保。

sentences.english: Is there a Breitling screen saver?

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4

definition: to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
camera self-timer mode (for delayed shutter release)
Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
